likelihood_impact_change.explanation: Under the Net Zero 2050 scenario, while biodiversity loss could still pose a risk, increased focus on sustainability and potential regulatory measures may help mitigate some impacts, leading to a slight decrease in both likelihood and impact.

emerging_opportunities.description: Transitioning to sustainable and recycled materials for iPhone production could enhance brand image and customer loyalty.

additional_challenges.description: Increased biodiversity loss may affect the availability of key materials, leading to potential disruptions in the supply chain.

mitigation_strategies.description: Develop partnerships with suppliers focused on sustainable practices to ensure the availability of needed materials.
Implement programs for recycling and refurbishing old iPhones to reduce demand for new resources.
Participate in or fund biodiversity conservation efforts which can help offset impacts and improve corporate image.
